article_title: Top Palestinian envoy says UK guilty of hypocrisy
sentence: About  24,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  bombardment  of  Gaza  -  most  of  them  women  and  children  -  since  7  October,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Top Palestinian envoy says UK guilty of hypocrisy
sentence: Israel  launched  its  war  with  the  declared  aim  of  destroying  Hamas  after  the  group  killed  about  1,200  people,  mostly  civilians,  and  took  some  240  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages  in  its  attack  on  Israel.

article_title: Top Palestinian envoy says UK guilty of hypocrisy
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: Top Palestinian envoy says UK guilty of hypocrisy
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
